channel.title: Something I've Noticed
channel.description: MoparScape is a populated community, but the majority of it's users do not get along. All individuals are equal; there is no need to flame others. Just be nice and treat others the way you would want to be treated; it is not that hard. It has also come to my attention that many of you are racist pigs who are in a state of pure ignorance. Why don't you travel to Africa and meet a local - they are nice people with the exact same capabilities as yourselves. Spread a good message, C'mon people!

I don’t really hate anyone else here besides him.[/quote]hahahah you have actually made me lol irl

your stupidity is overwhelming, as well as your lack of matureness to come up with something as imbecilic as what you’ve just said

item.title: Something I've Noticed
item.dc:creator: @Surname Surname-
item.description:
@Surname wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:23, topic:319951”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=416388.msg3062966#msg3062966 date=1261000458]

[quote]Sadly, this isn’t going to change, when one of them leave three more join, and just face it, There is more immaturity in the world to get rid of it in a single community.[/quote] = false;

There could be mature people that join the forum. Who is to say who will join? As a matter o’ fact, who is to say what mature is? Certainly not either of us.
[/quote]
Not really. There are more immature individuals on the internet and in our world than those who are mature.[/quote]

Amen to that.

item.title: Something I've Noticed
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Yes, a lot of people realized this. However, it cannot be changed. It happens in real life too, not as bad, but you don’t get along with everyone. People get on another’s nerves, or people begin to think that they are the best of the best.

I don’t see how people can go around and call all Americans stupid, because that is an exact example of above. I’m not going to start a debate between continents, but anyway…

Perhaps this thread will at least decrease the arguing between the people who have read it.

Read full topic
